author: TylerPaper.com
title: Ground News - Unprecedented boom in the popularity of romance novels
text:
Summary by TylerPaper.com Romance novels generate around $1.44 billion in revenue every year. In a growing market that exploded even further during the pandemic, stories of love and lust rank as the highest-earning fiction genre. Share menu More
